entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries over southern sections late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight except gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
